name: Gains Network USDC (Base)
description: Gains Network is developing gTrade, a highly efficient, robust, and user-friendly decentralized leveraged trading platform. Users can open trades using $DAI, $USDC, or $WETH as collateral, regardless of the trading pair. The platform offers synthetic leverage, backed by the gToken vault and the $GNS token. gTrade utilizes a custom real-time Chainlink network to provide median pricing for each trading pair.
